Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

beginTileCapture(address,uint64,uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

cancelTileCapture(address,uint64).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

claimTileCapture(address,uint64).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

era().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

giveUpCapturedTile(address,uint64).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

handleSettlementCreatedOnPosition(uint64.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

params.initParams: Encoded init params (every world asset has own knowledge how to extract data from it)

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

settlementCapturedTiles.details: Mapping containing captured tiles by provided settlement address

CannotBeginTileCaptureBySettlementAlread.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture by settlement which already has maximum allowed tiles with same bonus as specified tile

CannotBeginTileCaptureBySettlementWhichI.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture by settlement which is already capturing tile

CannotBeginTileCaptureDueToNonExistentPo.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture of non existent position

CannotBeginTileCaptureDueToNotHavingSpec.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture with not having specified amount of prosperity

CannotBeginTileCaptureDueToNotReachedNex.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture with prosperity stake lower than next minimum prosperity stake

CannotBeginTileCaptureOfPositionWithoutB.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture of position without tile bonus

CannotBeginTileCaptureOnNotActivatedRegi.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture of position on not activated region

CannotBeginTileCaptureOnPositionWithSett.notice: Thrown when attempting to begin tile capture on position with settlement on it

CapturedTileCannotBeGivenUpByNonSettleme.notice: Thrown when attempting to give up captured tile by settlement which is not owner of specified tile

ClaimTileCaptureCannotBeDoneAtThisTime().notice: Thrown when attempting to claim captured tile at this time (it is still capturing)

ClaimTileCaptureCannotBeDoneByNonUsurper.notice: Thrown when attempting to claim captured tile by settlement which was not capturing specified tile

ClaimTileCaptureCannotBeDoneWithoutNeces.notice: Thrown when attempting to claim captured tile without necessary prosperity in settlement

OnlyActiveGame().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called in active game (started and not finished)

OnlyMightyCreator().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called by mighty creator

OnlyWorldAssetFromSameEra().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called by world asset from same era

TileCaptureCannotBeCancelledBySettlement.notice: Thrown when attempting to cancel tile capture by settlement which is not currently capturing specified tile

UnknownTileBonus().notice: Thrown when attempting to apply or remove tile bonus. It should not be thrown ever, if it does this will indicate logic error

getCapturedTilesBySettlementAddress(addr.notice: Returns positions of captured tiles for provided settlement address

settlementCapturingTile(address).notice: Mapping containing settlements' current capturing tile

tilesInfo(uint64).notice: Mapping containing tile info by provided position

worldAssetFactory().notice: Returns world asset factory from registry
